coded_answer.p: After having read your letter, I writeam writing to you to inform you that I would like to travel in July. It is the only month wherethat I don't work. As for the accommodationsaccommodation, I would prefer a tent, there's. There's nothing like hearing raindrops on canvas at night!

Last but not least, I would like to go sailing and climbing. I have sailed somea little in my youth but have never wentbeen climbing. It would be a fun experianceexperience! Will I be needing any money.? Please send me a list of neededrequired clothes and/or supplies. Thank you very much.

I would like to know if there is a medical staff present during the two weeks?. Does any medication have to be declared to them? In case ofIn the event of anyan accidentsaccident, will the transport back home be paid for?
Why can shopping be unenjoyableis it that shopping is sometimes unenjoyable?
First of all, it depends on who is with you and what the other person likes to shop for.

Some people are boring to shop with, they don't talk or comment on anything they see. Why would anyone shop with that type of person? Well, I really don't know. Women, in perticularparticular, have the annoying habit of always having to touch everything they see. If it is something they like, they always have to try it on. We all know how it is when a woman triedtries on some clothes (usually several items) but it'sthat's still better than when we're talking about shoes! That has to be the worst. Seeing or imagining a woman in the clothsclothes she chooses can at least help when you beingare bored, but shoes are just shoes. Shopping for them is a very long and tiring experianceexperienceprocess. It seems to last forever and just when you think she's done, she spots an otheanother pair.
Shopping for mein my opinion is supposed to be a very fastquick experianceexperienceprocess. As soon as someone else is with you, it can become horrible!
